name: architecture
description: Major code changes to improve overall design

name: bugfix
description: Something isn't working and will be added to release

name: hold
description: Temporary hold before accepting or merging

name: hotfix
description: Something isn't working and must be fixed ASAP

name: refactor
description: Improve source code without changing functionality

name: spike
description: Proof of concept for new feature or pattern

name: testing
description: Adding, rewriting, or fixing automated tests
